QuestData.Title: Round 1: Brewmaster Chani
QuestData.Description: Welcome, Challenger, to my tournament of champions! Today we test the strengths of Pandaria's most dedicated heroes.$b$bYour first opponent awaits you under the eastern gazebo. Defeat her, and you may proceed to the next round.$b$bFight with strength, fight with honor.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: New to her status as a Brewmaster, her brews are painfully bitter.
